chapters.title: Chapter 31: The Far Snows
chapters.info: Kimry Lewin, p. 514 (364)—A young woman from Emond's Field. She and Bar Dowtry were caught by Nynaeve in Bar's father's hayloft doing something they should not have been doing before they were married. She was 21 years old at the time; her mother was not pleased, and neither Kimry nor Bar could sit for their first week of marriage. The Women's Circle decided that a month was the shortest possible period of engagement, and the two barely got by a few minutes without another strapping of some kind until the month was up.
